item.title: SQL Window Functions (Basics)
item.description: Understanding how SQL Window Functions Work Window functions are also aggregation functions For group by aggregation - one row is returned per group with overall aggregation on the entire group. However for window function - each row is returned back, and individual row information is used in the aggregation. OVER() is used to define a window - the 3 operations below are encapsulated in this OVER() clause Three Important operations -
